name: Stormbind
description:
Stormbind Arcade style robotron-like game

Tether like enemies together to destroy them.

Game created in 1 week for Lost Relic Game Jam #1

Instructions

  • WASD to move
  • Click to shoot
  • Q to use a force push on certain enemy types
  • ESC or P to pause the game with the option to exit

Install

  1. Download the .zip file and extract it.
  2. Run ConnectionJam.exe

Credits

  • Created by Jonathan Brown, Nick Johnson
  • SFX from Splice
